justification: "As per Daniel-Watanabe et al. 2022, we measured negative bias as the proportion of high reward choices on ambiguous stimuli."

measured_by: gain parameter (ln|G|) from the dynamic reward task
justification: "We computed a gain parameter G, interpreted as reward sensitivity… with 1<G<∞ corresponding to liberal and 0<G<1 corresponding to conservative responding."

measured_by: learning rate parameter (α) from the dynamic reward task
justification: "We also computed the learning rate, α (0≤α≤1)… interpreted as a participant's sensitivity to new information."

measured_by: risk aversion parameter (r) from the Prospect Theory gambling task
justification: "We used a prospect theory model to extract three parameters per participant from their gamble choices: risk aversion (r)…"

measured_by: loss aversion parameter (δ) from the Prospect Theory gambling task
justification: "We used a prospect theory model to extract three parameters per participant… loss aversion (δ)…"

measured_by: setting noise parameter (σ) in the dynamic SDT model
justification: "…a setting noise parameter (σ) reflecting the accuracy of mapping the decision to an actual response, with larger numbers corresponding to greater inaccuracies."
